mods.abstract: The recording is of two segments of This Little Light of Mine. This Little Light of Mine is a show that provides introspection to the main influencers of African-American gospel. The first segment is hosted by Bobby Jones (host). The first segment reflects on the life of C. L. Franklin (singer/songwriter), and is called "C. L. Franklin: Gospel Preacher." The second segment is hosted by an unidentified host and features testimony by Sweet Honey in the Rock member, Bernice Johnson-Reagon. The second segment is called, "Sweet Honey in the Rock: New Songs From An Old Tradition." The recordings are from unidentified dates.
